settings.raw_content_1:
The Elevé Studio Reformer is the pinnacle of luxury Pilates, designed not just to match studio-grade performance, but to exceed it in every detail. 

Handcrafted from premium beech wood imported from Germany, it’s built with integrity, presence, and longevity in mind. Every curve and component reflects a commitment to timeless strength and modern grace, made for the woman who has moved beyond the beginner phase and into full embodiment.

With ultra-quiet glide, elite-level resistance, and world-class craftsmanship trusted by studios around the globe, the Studio Reformer delivers a seamless fusion of performance and beauty.

Only 50 are made each month. This isn’t just a reformer, it’s a declaration. 

You’ve arrived.
settings.raw_content_2:
Frame: Handcrafted beech wood imported from Germany-

91 inches (length) x 25.5 inches (width) x 14 inches (height)

Resistance System: Industry-leading Korean Elephant™ springs (3 red, 1 blue, 1 green) with ultra-stable tension, nickel-plated, and fatigue resistance 

Upholstery: Premium super fiber leather — scratch-resistant, breathable, and built to last 8+ years

Glide System: Ultra-quiet high-elastic wheels with precision Japanese NMB bearings

Tower System: Integrated metal tower for advanced movements and full-body versatility (Height = 83.5 inches)
settings.raw_content_3:
Each Elevé Studio Reformer is handcrafted to order, not mass-produced. From the moment you reserve yours, a dedicated build begins.

*Free Shipping*

Production Time: Please allow 5–6 weeks for crafting. Every detail is built by hand to ensure unmatched quality.

Shipping Time: Once completed, your reformer will ship via premium freight service, delivered in 4–5 weeks with full tracking.

You’ll receive updates at each stage of the journey, from build to delivery, so you can anticipate its arrival with confidence.

settings.title: What makes the Elevé Studio different from other reformers?
settings.content:
The Elevé Studio Reformer isn’t just another piece of fitness equipment; it's an entirely elevated experience.

Meticulously handcrafted with premium beech wood, advanced Korean Elephant springs, and an integrated metal tower, it provides studio-grade precision in your own home.

Unlike mass-produced options, the Elevé Studio is limited to only 50 units per month, ensuring unparalleled quality, exclusivity, and luxury in every detail.

settings.title: What is an FSA or HSA and what are the benefits?
settings.content: Health Savings Accounts (HSAs) and Flexible Spending Accounts (FSAs) offer tax advantages for health-related expenses. The key difference is ownership—FSAs are employer-owned and typically “use it or lose it,” meaning unused funds expire yearly. HSAs, however, are individually owned, staying with you through job changes and allowing self-employed individuals to open one. Unlike FSAs, HSA funds can be invested and grow tax-free over time, making them a flexible long-term option for managing healthcare costs.

settings.title: Is there a payment plan?
settings.content:
Yes, and we encourage you to use it.
You can split your purchase into 6 interest-free payments with Shop Pay. That’s around $388/month for the Elevé Reformer, less than most studio memberships.

settings.title: Does it come fully assembled?
settings.content: Yes, it arrives 85% assembled, with minimal setup required. We believe luxury should feel effortless, and Elevé Studio is ready for ritual right out of the box.

settings.title: Will it fit in my space?
settings.content:
The Elevé Studio is designed to seamlessly integrate into your home studio space. Here’s what you need to know:

Frame: 91" (length) x 25.5" (width) x 14" (height)

Height with Tower: 83.5" (approximately 7 feet)

Placement Recommendations: Ideal placement is in a dedicated workout area, spare bedroom, or spacious corner of your living area

Assembly and Moving: The Elevé Studio requires two adults to move safely. Once assembled, it remains in a fixed position, providing stable, studio-quality performance.

If you're unsure about your specific space, our customer support team is available to assist with personalized recommendations.

settings.title: What's included with my purchase?
settings.content:
Elevé Studio Reformer: Handcrafted premium wood frame with built-in tower for complete Pilates functionality.

Jumpboard & Box: Expand your routine, enabling dynamic cardio exercises and deeper strength training.

Platform Extender: Provides additional versatility for standing exercises and stretches.

Padded Studio Mat: Premium mat designed specifically for use with your Elevé Studio, offering maximum comfort and support.

settings.title: Whats's the return policy?
settings.content: Your Elevé Studio comes with a comprehensive warranty: 30-Day Guarantee. Rest assured, we design and build our reformers to last a lifetime.

settings.title: Will I actually see results from using this?
settings.content:
Yes! When you move with Elevé, you activate deep core muscles, sculpt long, lean lines, and lift and define areas traditional workouts often miss.

Our system is designed around scientifically proven Pilates principles, with beginner-friendly routines to get you visible results faster (even in just 20–30 minutes a day).
